en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Guangzhou

en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, will depart for Guangzhou tomorrow morning (July 25). She will visit the High People's Court and the Department of Justice of Guangdong Province to explore opportunities for further collaboration.
Ms Cheng will return to Hong Kong in the evening on the same day.
zh: 律政司司長鄭若驊資深大律師明日（七月二十五日）上午啟程前往廣州，到訪廣東省高級人民法院及廣東省司法廳，探討如何加強雙方合作的機會。
鄭若驊於同日晚上返回香港。

en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, will depart for Guangzhou tomorrow morning (July 25)
She will visit the High People's Court and the Department of Justice of Guangdong Province to explore opportunities for further collaboration.
Ms Cheng will return to Hong Kong in the evening on the same day.
